casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John SINCLAIR 261P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016

Mr. John Sinclair, Pro Se.

*236Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of July 2016 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
